import React, { useState } from 'react'; import '../styles/FAQ.css'; function FAQ() { const [toggled, setToggle] = useState(); console.log(toggled); const handleToggle = (index) => setToggle(toggled === index ? 0 : index); return (

FAQ

Frequently Asked Questions

console.log(document.querySelectorAll('.question-panel-box').length) } className="panel-title" > How Long should my service take?

Typical turnaround time work for all jobs is 10-12 business days after clubs arrive at my shop.

handleToggle('2')} className="panel-title"> What if the parts our out of stock?

We will do our best to keep out website updated with ONLY parts that are in stock. If we see an order with a part on it that is out of stock, we will quickly notify the customer and a decision will be made then.

); } export default FAQ; const styles = { expanded: { display: 'block', }, collapsed: { display: 'none', }, };
